caption.p: Assessment of the post-exposure antiviral activity of ZnO-NPs, ZnO-PEG-NPs, polyethylene glycol, and oseltamivir on the titer of H1N1 influenza virus by TCID50 assay. * Statistically significant ( p < 0.0001). Error bars represent the confidence interval for the mean ( n = 3) at the 95% level
